verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) - In [ARG0: a surprise announcement] [R-ARG0: that] [V: caught] [ARG1: the candidate] [ARG2: off - guard] , President Donald Trump said Friday he 'll nominate acting Veterans Affairs Secretary Robert Wilkie to permanently lead the beleaguered department .
